message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to make a deal at that price.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that. I'm willing to go up to $95, but that's as high as I can go.
I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you at $100, but that's as low as I can go. I'm not making any more concessions after this.
